\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

	% https://q.uiver.app/#
	\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\&\& {Z^V} \& {Z^V} \\
	\& X \& E \& {Z^U} \\
	{\,} \& X \& {X_V \oplus Y} \& Z \& {\,} \\
	\&\& Y
	\arrow[equals, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[dashed, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[dashed, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\binom if}", from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{(0,1)}"', dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\end{tikzcd}
	\end{document}
